Subject: POC: User remediation pop up notification does not show up
Description:
Hi team,

The User remediation pop up notification does not show. It shows up only when we open the NEP client, in the CAP section. We are allowed to self remediate the action but we cannot see the pop up displayed. What could be the issue?

Could you please help us with this?

Thank you,
Stefania
Solution_Comment__c: The rights were not set with priority on user.
